level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary addition of section, see § 1403 of the Fiscal Year 1999 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-401, July 13, 1998, 45 DCR 4794), and § 1403 of the Fiscal Year 1999 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-564, January 12, 1999, 46 DCR 669).
For temporary (90-day) addition of Chapter 11, see notes following § 10-1001.
For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 1012(a) of Fiscal Year 2012 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2011 (D.C. Act 19-93, June 29, 2011, 58 DCR 5599).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-175
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-175, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 10-1001.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-21
level.text: For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 10-1001.
